name: The Last Light (JwrH)
description:
I am a complete beginner and this is my first game that I have made, while following an online Udemy course. 

It is very basic and just a learning experience! I know there are bits not perfect, but good enough for the time being while I move onto bigger things!

Left and Right arrows to Move the Player, Spacebar to Dash. Get hit 3 times and you are out!
